DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effects of a protein-carbohydrate beverage on the absorption of an orally ingested bolus of L-carnitine, compared to flavoured water and carbohydrate-only controls, and to determine whether increasing plasma carnitine availability can impact upon insulin-stimulated muscle carnitine uptake.
DOC.brief_title: Protein Ingestion and Muscle Carnitine Uptake
DOC.criteria: Healthy Body mass index of 1825 kg/cm2 Unhealthy Smoker Taking any medication that interferes with skeletal muscle metabolism
